title: october 10: from the atlantic to the pacific and beyond
description:
On this day in history the exciting world of exports and imports was changed forever. Known now as the transit county, Maia teaches us about the monumental day Panama got its claim to fame and how it changed the world of transatlantic exporting forever. Speaking of monumental moments, Maia shares the opening of the Gibson guitar company who makes one of the most iconic guitars in the world today. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
